definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a kind of balsam, as merchandise Ge 37:25 (J), Ez Eze 27:17, gift Ge 43:11 (J), medicament Je 8:22, Je 46:11, Je 51:8 (for national disaster, in fig,);—ThDyerM'Lean in Ency. Bib.:Balm think a resin, like (not necess.=) gum of mastic-tree, pistacia lentiscus (otherwise Post:Hastings DB).
